snippet: The genocide trial of a former dictator of Guatemala, Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt, resumed Tuesday, 12 days after a judge ruled to annul the court proceedings.
abstract: Genocide trial of former Guatemalan dictator Gen Efrain Rios Montt resumes 12 days after judge annulled court proceedings; legality of decision is under scrutiny, but experts say more delays are possible.
lead_paragraph: The genocide trial of a former dictator of Guatemala, Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt, resumed Tuesday, 12 days after a judge ruled to annul the court proceedings.

headline.main: Guatemala: Former Dictator’s Genocide Trial Resumes
headline.print_headline: Guatemala: Former Dictator’s Genocide Trial Resumes

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
